ratePage-desc: Enables users to rate pages on a wiki and collects basic page views statistics.
apihelp-pagerating-summary: Gets the rating for a page. Requires specyfying one of two parameters: pageid or pagetitle.
apihelp-voteonpage-summary: Allows a user to vote on a page and gets the rating for a page. Requires specyfying one of two parameters: pageid or pagetitle.
